{"id":1192183480,"question_id":3335,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1709435351,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"51 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1192183480/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Write the Letter Y on a Grid","memory":"40.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool chk(int x, int y, int n){\n        int m = n / 2;\n        if(x == y && y <= m) return true;\n        if(x + y == n-1 && y > m) return true;\n        if(x > m && y == m) return true;\n        return false;\n    }\n    int minimumOperationsToWriteY(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int n = grid.size();\n        int a[3] = {}, b[3] = {};\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){\n            for(int j = 0; j < n; j++){\n                if(chk(i, j, n)){\n                    a[grid[i][j]]++;\n                }else b[grid[i][j]]++;\n            }\n        }\n        // cout << a[0] << ' ' << a[1] << ' ' << a[2] << endl;\n        // cout << b[0] << ' ' << b[1] << ' ' << b[2] << endl;\n        cout << endl;\n        int ans = 2500, sa = a[0] + a[1] + a[2], sb = b[0] + b[1] + b[2];\n        for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++){\n            for(int j = 0; j < 3; j++){\n                if(i != j){\n                    ans = min(ans, sa - a[i] + sb - b[j]);\n                    //cout << i << ' ' << j << ' ' << sa - a[i] + sb - b[j] << endl;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-write-the-letter-y-on-a-grid","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
